channel.title: Experts only!
channel.description:
Hey i need to know how to change a section of my server that is wilderness to non - wilderness
For example, say varrock is wild, how would i make that non wild?

item.title: Experts only!
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:9, topic:166899”][quote author=snowycards link=topic=226185.msg1946828#msg1946828 date=1198375618]

[code]heres the answer to make a WILDERNESS ZONE into a NON WILDERNESS ZONE forexample, draynor village

search for this public boolean nonWild

you should see something like this public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 2582 && absX <= 2595 && absY >= 9483 && absY <= 9495 || absX >= 2818 && absX <= 2860 && absY >= 3230 && absY <= 3312 || absX >= 3201 && absX <= 3226 && absY >= 3201 && absY <= 3234 || absX >= 2536 && absX <= 2620 && absY >= 3073 && absY <= 3110 ||absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >= 2790 && absX <= 2855 && absY >= 3418 && absY <=3466 ) || (absX >= 2584 && absX <= 2612 && absY >= 3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >= 2935 && absX <= 3066 && absY >= 2935 && absY <= 3399 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2747 && absX <=2758 && absY >=2794 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2764 && absX <=2776 && absY >=2793 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2773 && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766 && absY <=2770 ) || (absX >=2751 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2777 ) || (absX >=2785 && absX <=2809 && absY >=2771 && absY <=2801 ) || (absX >=2732 && absX <=2740 && absY >=2789 && absY <=2796 ) || (absX >=2861 && absX <=2872 && absY >=10186 && absY <=10212 ) || (absX >=3409 && absX <=3452 && absY >=3532 && absY <=3575 ) || (absX >=2435 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3080 && absY <=3099 ) || (absX >=3267 && absX <=3332 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3270 ) || (absX >=3151 && absX <=3182 && absY >=3220 && absY <=3272 ) || (absX >=3032 && absX <=3063 && absY >=3424 && absY <=3457 ) || (absX >=3476 && absX <=3501 && absY >=9483 && absY <=9505 ) || (absX >=2942 && absX <=2992 && absY >=3390 && absY <=3414 ) || (absX >=2420 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 ) || (absX >=3071 && absX <=3122 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >=3101 && absX <=3124 && absY >=9825 && absY <=9849 ) || (absX >=2585 && absX <=2605 && absY >=3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >=2853 && absX <=2926 && absY >=3530 && absY <=3577 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2622 && absY >=3841 && absY <=3902 ) || (absX >=2887 && absX <=2699 && absY >=2939 && absY <=2741 ) || (absX >=2742 && absX <=2815 && absY >=3146 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2692 && absX <=2810 && absY >=2690 && absY <=2808 ) || (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878 && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

so basicly, to add the zone in, go to the north east corner of the place (the farthest north east corner of the place) and add the coords into ((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= #### ||

and add the coords into the absX <= ####, and for the y coordinate into absY <=

now go to the south west corner, and add those coords to the absX >= and abs X <=

if you need further help you can pm me and ill help , or you can send me your client.java (not recommended)[/code]
[/quote]

Lmao,you just copied that off a tut,when i told him in the first place to use the search button.[/quote]

idiot nub, i didnt copy that off a tut

search for this public boolean nonWild

you should see something like this public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 2582 && absX <= 2595 && absY >= 9483 && absY <= 9495 || absX >= 2818 && absX <= 2860 && absY >= 3230 && absY <= 3312 || absX >= 3201 && absX <= 3226 && absY >= 3201 && absY <= 3234 || absX >= 2536 && absX <= 2620 && absY >= 3073 && absY <= 3110 ||absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3039 && absX <= 3111 && absY >= 3475 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >= 2790 && absX <= 2855 && absY >= 3418 && absY <=3466 ) || (absX >= 2584 && absX <= 2612 && absY >= 3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >= 2935 && absX <= 3066 && absY >= 2935 && absY <= 3399 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) || (absX >=2747 && absX <=2758 && absY >=2794 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2764 && absX <=2776 && absY >=2793 && absY <=2802 ) || (absX >=2773 && absX <=2780 && absY >=2766 && absY <=2770 ) || (absX >=2751 && absX <=2770 && absY >=2764 && absY <=2777 ) || (absX >=2785 && absX <=2809 && absY >=2771 && absY <=2801 ) || (absX >=2732 && absX <=2740 && absY >=2789 && absY <=2796 ) || (absX >=2861 && absX <=2872 && absY >=10186 && absY <=10212 ) || (absX >=3409 && absX <=3452 && absY >=3532 && absY <=3575 ) || (absX >=2435 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3080 && absY <=3099 ) || (absX >=3267 && absX <=3332 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3270 ) || (absX >=3151 && absX <=3182 && absY >=3220 && absY <=3272 ) || (absX >=3032 && absX <=3063 && absY >=3424 && absY <=3457 ) || (absX >=3476 && absX <=3501 && absY >=9483 && absY <=9505 ) || (absX >=2942 && absX <=2992 && absY >=3390 && absY <=3414 ) || (absX >=2420 && absX <=2431 && absY >=3072 && absY <=3083 ) || (absX >=3071 && absX <=3122 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3523 ) || (absX >=3101 && absX <=3124 && absY >=9825 && absY <=9849 ) || (absX >=2585 && absX <=2605 && absY >=3153 && absY <=3169 ) || (absX >=2853 && absX <=2926 && absY >=3530 && absY <=3577 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2622 && absY >=3841 && absY <=3902 ) || (absX >=2887 && absX <=2699 && absY >=2939 && absY <=2741 ) || (absX >=2742 && absX <=2815 && absY >=3146 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2692 && absX <=2810 && absY >=2690 && absY <=2808 ) || (absX >= 2437 && absX <=2446 && absY >= 3082 && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 2805 && absX <=2878 && absY >= 3222 && absY <=3313 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

so basicly, to add the zone in, go to the north east corner of the place (the farthest north east corner of the place) and add the coords into ((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= #### ||

and add the coords into the absX <= ####, and for the y coordinate into absY <=

now go to the south west corner, and add those coords to the absX >= and abs X <=

if you need further help you can pm me and ill help , or you can send me your client.java (not recommended)[/code][/quote]

Lmao,you just copied that off a tut,when i told him in the first place to use the search button.
